awd_titl_txt: Enhancing the Interaction between Chemists in Hungary and   the United States
awd_abstract_narration: This award supports a delegation of chemists from U.S.                          universities to Hungary to get acquainted with the research                     activities in chemistry in Hungarian universities.  The purpose                 of the visit is to pinpoint areas and topics for enhanced                       interaction between U.S. chemists and their Hungarian                           colleagues for the mutual benefit of chemistry in both                          countries.  This is a research planning grant which involves a                  report to the Foundation shortly after completion of the trip.                  The report will be widely circulated to other government                        agencies as a means to expedite interactions between the U.S.                   and Hungary chemists.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

inst.inst_name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
inst.org_lgl_bus_name: UNIVERSITY OF NORTH CAROLINA AT CHAPEL HILL
